Class Logger

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.luka5w.util.cli.Logger

  • public class Logger
extends java.lang.Object
    Logger

    A logging utility

    GitHub: https://github.com/luka5w/javautils

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Logger(java.lang.String name, int level)
      Creates a new root logger with a specific log level.
      Logger(java.lang.String name, Logger parent)
      Creates a new child-logger from a parent-logger.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Logger

        public Logger(java.lang.String name,
              int level)
        Creates a new root logger with a specific log level.
        • 0: [D] Everything
        • 1: [I] Info and higher
        • 2: [L] Logs and higher
        • 3: [W] Warnings and higher
        • 4: [E] Only errors and exceptions
        Parameters:
        name - The program name.
        level - The log level.
        Since:
        1.0.0

      • Logger

        public Logger(java.lang.String name,
              Logger parent)
        Creates a new child-logger from a parent-logger.
        Parameters:
        name - The child program name.
        parent - The parent logger
        Since:
        1.0.0

    • Method Detail

      • debug

        public void debug(java.lang.Object o)
        Logs a debug message when the log level is 0.

        The object will be parsed as String with Object.toString()

        Parameters:
        o - The message to log.
        Since:
        1.0.0

      • error

        public void error(java.lang.Object o,
                  boolean exit)
        Logs an error message and exits the program when exit is true.

        The object will be parsed as String with Object.toString()

        Parameters:
        o - The message to log.
        exit - Whether the program should exit with status code -1 or not.
        Since:
        1.0.0

      • exception

        e - The exception.
        Since:

      • exception
